Description.Text: Hotel Monte Sarago is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of Ostuni. Highlights include a rooftop swimming pool, restaurant and a good location close to the historic old town. Ostuni is a popular tourist destination situated close to the pristine beaches of the Adriatic coast. Its picturesque old town is notable for its many white-painted buildings which give it its name "The White City". Nearby places of interest include the Basilicata, Apulia, the Castellan Caves and the Castel del Monte UNESCO World Heritage Sites. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Ostuni destinations. The hotel occupies a modern low-rise building with a rooftop terrace. Facilities include a rooftop swimming pool. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style with a neutral colour scheme. Amenities include a 32-inch flat-screen TV, air-conditioning, mini-bar, safe, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. The L'Opificio restaurant serves Mediterranean-style cuisine in a comfortable setting. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the elegant hotel bar. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and concierge service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
